Strike to foe's upper arm. +3 hits. Foe takes 3 hits/rnd and is at -25. Foe is stunned for 2 rnds.
Side wound. Foe takes 5 hits per rnd and is stunned for 6 rnds. Add +20 to your next attack.
Strike foe in back. Foe is at -20 and takes 3 hits/rnd. Foe is stunned and unable to parry 2 rnds.
Rip off foe's ear. +3 hits. Foe takes 2 hits/rnd, hears at -50. Foe is stunned and not able to parry for 2 rnds.
Strike foe's nose, leaving a permanent scar. Foe takes 3 hits/rnd. Foe is stunned and unable to parry 3 rnds.
Strike through neck severs vein and artery. Foe cannot breath. Foe drops and dies of a massive heart failure.
